trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that contain text.
trans-unit.target: 公開方法與屬性，以支援包含文字之控制項的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>控制項模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>

trans-unit.source: Gets a text range that encloses the main text of a document.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含文件主要文字的文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: Some auxiliary text such as headers, footnotes, or annotations may not be included.
trans-unit.target: 可能不會包含一些輔助的文字，例如標頭、 註腳或註解。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of disjoint text ranges associated with the current text selection or selections.
trans-unit.target: 擷取與目前文字選取範圍或選取項目關聯之斷續文字範圍的集合。

trans-unit.source: For UI Automation providers that support text selection, the provider should implement this method and also return a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.SupportedTextSelection%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 對於支援文字選取範圍的使用者介面自動化提供者，提供者應該實作這個方法，而且還會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.SupportedTextSelection%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider.SupportedTextSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no text is selected, GetSelection returns the degenerate text range (empty range) at the position of the system cursor (text insertion point).
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有選取文字，GetSelection 系統游標 （文字插入點） 的位置傳回變質文字範圍 （空白範圍）。

trans-unit.source: If the system cursor (text insertion point) is not present, GetSelection may return a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 如果系統游標 （文字插入點） 不存在，GetSelection 可能會傳回 null 參考 (`Nothing`中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: A collection of disjoint text ranges.
trans-unit.target: 斷續文字範圍的集合。

trans-unit.source: If the UI Automation provider does not support text selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者介面自動化提供者不支援文字選取範圍。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an array of disjoint text ranges from a text container where each text range begins with the first partially visible line through to the end of the last partially visible line.
trans-unit.target: 其中每一個文字範圍都以至最後一個局部可見行結尾透過第一個局部可見行開頭的文字容器擷取斷續文字範圍的陣列。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should ensure that they return, at most, the text ranges that are visible within the container.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應確保它們傳回，最多會在容器內可見文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: Disjoint text ranges may occur when any content of a text container is obscured by an overlapping window or other object, or when a text container with a multi-column layout has one or more columns partially scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: 斷續的文字範圍重疊的視窗或其他物件時，被遮蔽文字容器的任何內容時或多個資料行配置的文字容器有一或多個資料行部分捲動到檢視可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: If no text is visible, a degenerate (empty) text range is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有文字為可見，則會傳回變質 （空的） 文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: This empty range can be returned if the text container is empty or when all text is scrolled out of view.
trans-unit.target: 如果是空的文字容器或所有文字都捲動到檢視時，可能會傳回這個空的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The collection of visible text ranges within the container or an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 容器或空的陣列內的可見文字範圍的集合。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) is never returned.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 絕對不會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a text range enclosing a child element such as an image, hyperlink, or other embedded object.
trans-unit.target: 擷取包含子項目，例如影像、 超連結或其他內嵌的物件的文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: A UI Automation provider should check that the passed element is a child of the text container.
trans-unit.target: UI 自動化提供者應該檢查傳遞的項目是文字容器的子系。

trans-unit.source: If there is no text in the range where the child element exists, a degenerate (empty) range is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果子項目所在的範圍中沒有任何文字，則會傳回變質 （空的） 的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The `childElement` parameter is either a child of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> or from the array of children of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>.
trans-unit.target: `childElement`參數是其中一個子系<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>或從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange>的子系的陣列</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern></xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: The enclosed object.
trans-unit.target: 包含的物件。

trans-unit.source: A range that spans the child element.
trans-unit.target: 跨越子項目的範圍。

trans-unit.source: If the child element is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: 如果子元素為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)])。

trans-unit.source: Returns the degenerate (empty) text range nearest to the specified screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回最接近指定的螢幕座標的變質 （空的） 文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: A text range that encloses a child object is returned if the screen coordinates are within the coordinates of an image, hyperlink, or other embedded object.
trans-unit.target: 如果螢幕座標的影像、 超連結或其他內嵌的物件的座標內，會傳回包含子物件的文字範圍。

trans-unit.source: Because hidden text is not ignored by RangeFromPoint a degenerate range from the visible text closest to the given point is returned.
trans-unit.target: 因為隱藏的文字不會忽略 RangeFromPoint 會傳回變質範圍從最接近指定位置的可見文字。

trans-unit.source: The location in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 螢幕座標中的位置。

trans-unit.source: A degenerate range nearest the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 最接近指定位置的變質範圍。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) is never returned.
trans-unit.target: Null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) 絕對不會傳回。

trans-unit.source: If a given point is outside the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element associated with the text pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果超出了指定的點[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素相關聯的文字模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether a text provider supports selection and, if so, the type of selection supported.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否為文字提供者支援選取項目，如果已選取項目的型別支援則。

trans-unit.source: One of <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Single" name="Single" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Multiple" name="Multiple" href=""></xref> from <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SupportedTextSelection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: One of <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Single" name="Single" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Multiple" name="Multiple" href=""></xref> from <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SupportedTextSelection"></xref>.
